Package People

Class Supervisor

java.lang.Object
People.User
People.Supervisor
Direct Known Subclasses:
FYPCoordinator
public class Supervisor extends User
Supervisor class containing an individual supervisor's attributes and functions

Extended from User superclass

    Field
    Description
    protected ArrayList<Request>
    IncomingRequestList
    Incoming Request List stores all incoming requests whose recepient is marked as this user

    OutgoingRequestList
    Outgoing Request List stores all outgoing requests whose originator is marked as this user

  • Field Details

    • IncomingRequestList

      protected ArrayList<Request> IncomingRequestList
      Incoming Request List stores all incoming requests whose recepient is marked as this user

    • OutgoingRequestList

      protected ArrayList<Request> OutgoingRequestList
      Outgoing Request List stores all outgoing requests whose originator is marked as this user

  • Constructor Details

    • Supervisor

      public Supervisor(String name, String userID, String password)
      Constructor for Supervisor Object initialisation
      Parameters:
      name - Supervisor's First and Last Name as obtained from CSV
      userID - stores userID as a supvID variable
      password - initially contains default 'password' obtained from CSV, stores new one if user decides to change it

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public void createProject(String projectTitle)
      Allow Supervisor user to create projects
      createProject directly creates a new Project object with an iterating serial number, supervisor name and provided project title This object is then appended to the main Project List (marking as 'Available' or not handled by add() function, not createProject)
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - Desired title for project given by Supervisor

    • modifyTitle

      public void modifyTitle(int ProjectID, String newTitle)
      Allow Supervisor user to change their own project title
      modifyTitle locates the project within the ProjectDatabase.ProjectList and calls setTitle with the given new title
      Parameters:
      ProjectID - the project to be targeted for title change
      newTitle - Desired new title for project

    • viewOwnProjects

      public void viewOwnProjects()
      Shows only the projects associated with this supervisor
      viewOwnProject iterates through the ProjectDatabase and prints all associated projects that match this supervisor's supvID
      Else prints an error message

    • reqTrfStudent

      public void reqTrfStudent(int ProjectID, String replacementSVid)
      Raise request for supervisor to transfer student to alternate supervisor
      reqTrfStudent allows supervisors to assign an alternate supervisor to the current supervisor's project
      Iterates through the SupervisorDatabase looking for an entry matching the replacement supervisor's ID, assigns this to 'replacement' object
      Parameters:
      ProjectID - the project to be targeted for the supervisor swap
      replacementSVid - ID of the new supervisor

    • handleRequest

      public void handleRequest(Request r)
      handleRequest displays different UI and questions based on the type of Request Object 'r' presented, accept/reject a supervisor's incoming requests
      Parameters:
      r - The incoming Request Object that is received by the current supervisor from originator

    • appendRequest

      public void appendRequest(Request r)
      Updates user if a new request entered in MasterRequestList relating to this user, Adds the new request to supervisor's personal incoming request list
      Parameters:
      r - Request Object passsed from RequestDatabase when a request was created by another user and addressed to this supervisor

    • viewOutgoingRequest

      public void viewOutgoingRequest()
      Iterates through this user's personal outgoing request list and prints all requests originating from this supervisor

    • getSuperID

      public String getSuperID()

    • getProjCount

      public int getProjCount()

    • getIncomingRequestNo

      public int getIncomingRequestNo()

      public int getViewedRequestNo()

    • getIncomingRequestList

      public ArrayList<Request> getIncomingRequestList()

    • incrementProjCount

      public void incrementProjCount()
      +1 this supervisor's total number of projects when called

    • decrementProjCount

      public void decrementProjCount()
      -1 this supervisor's total number of projects when called
